thread.title: Stardust Big Band Halloween costume party
thread.title_full: Stardust Big Band Halloween costume party

author: hdmoadmin
title: Stardust Big Band Halloween costume party
text:
6:02 am - October 20, 2015 Stardust Big Band Halloween costume party The Dixie Darlings 
After a successful tour in Arkansas, the Stardust Big Band will return to the once-a-month Arlington Resort Hotel Sunday dance on Sunday starting at 3 p.m. Stardust was featured with the Fun City Chorus in its tribute to Broadway, and the Batesville Old Independence Regional Museum showcased Stardust at itsrecent fundraiser. Attendees at the Arlington events enjoy watching the dancers and listening to the famous big band arrangements of yesterday and today. Dancers come to practice their new dance steps. A prize for best female and best male costume will be awarded at the Sunday event. 
A special treat for all will be the Dixie Darlings on Sunday. This is a dance team of eleven terrific dancers who will “step the light fantastic” on two numbers. They won second prize in the recent “Dancing for a Cause,” sponsored by the Women’s Chamber of Commerce. 
Admission is $10; no admission charge for students K-12. The Stardust Big Band is a feature on the Arkansas Arts on Tour roster and nonprofit organizations may request assistance in funding when contracting a performance from Stardust. For information or scheduling, call 501-767-5482 or visit www.stardustband.net
